website_summaries.verdict: By far the best beach umbrella on the market today – the price is an investment for your beach trips that will last for years to come.
pros: Surpasses its competitors with its impressive feature set that includes 50 UPF sun protection, solid build rated to withstand 35 mph winds, and stable weighted base system
Comes with accessory kit that includes case, sand scoop, and a 3-year protection plan
cons: The most expensive model on our shortlist
Some owners wish that the pole had a tilt mechanism

customer_reviews.title: A must have for a beach trip
customer_reviews.text: If you got the extra money go for it. Here its a video to show you why
customer_reviews.author: rolaynd

customer_reviews.title: Second time using it. Normal beach day. Nothing ...
customer_reviews.text: Second time using it. Normal beach day. Nothing crazy and this happens. Will call company on Monday to see about a replacement. UPDATE: After writing my review, I was contacted by Bill Schermerhorn, the President of Beach Bub. A replacement umbrella was sent to us within a few days. I appreciate the company's prompt response and excellent customer service. We look forward to returning to the beach soon with our Beach Bub. I am changing my review from a 1 to a 4. The only reason I am not giving it a 5 is because of the hassle of it breaking the first time.
customer_reviews.author: K. Adams

customer_reviews.title: A Windy Day at the Beach Did it in
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this pricy umbrella last summer. It was a wonderful purchase and I was very happy with it. Went to the Outer Banks last July and there was a steady wind. It flew off and all the ribs broke. I was stunned. Now I just rent a sturdy canvas umbrella and chairs from the lifeguards. This happened in the Outer Banks. Truly disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Mary A. Hawthorne

customer_reviews.title: Broke in the wind on the first day or so ...
customer_reviews.text: Broke in the wind on the first day or so. The company fully refunded us and they get props for that, but this item is not really going to work for any beach that has any amount of wind.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Swartz

customer_reviews.title: It's True!!
customer_reviews.text: I was so skeptical about being able to put this umbrella up all by myself. AND I was nervous that it would not hold up to the winds here. But to my pleasant surprise I was successful and after a few minutes I realized this umbrella is not going anywhere! I was perfectly at ease. I watched several people struggle with their inverted umbrellas due to the wind. On Easter Sunday the beach was packed and my umbrella was the only one fully upright. All the others were on the ground facing into the wind which blocked their view of the ocean. Well worth the investment in my opinion. So happy! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: L. Helker

customer_reviews.title: So strong! Perfectly anchored and the inside structure is so sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a beast. Everyone asked us about our awesome umbrella. 7 days of strong winds at Myrtle Beach. One day we blocked 4 different runaway umbrellas from impaling beachgoers. This thing stayed put. It doesn’t budge... barely rocks at all. The structure within the umbrellas is made of heavy duty materials. One of our cheap umbrellas folded up and broke. Another folded inward and snapped. (See pics) But this umbrella? Barely swayed. Worth the money. The people who sat under this umbrella also saw less sun exposure than the other umbrellas. I was doubtful, I truly was. I hated spending $130... but guys, TOTALLY WORTH IT. we’re buying a second one for next year.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Good until it broke.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great at first and then on a recent beach trip it failed. Much like another customer on here, we had light winds and all of a sudden snap, a piece of metal ring popped out and the umbrella became useless for the remainder of our week long beach trip.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Not what we expected
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella broke on day 1 of our vacation. Can we return it? We even adjusted the tension on the arms. It snapped, hit my husband in the face, and the umbrella, not the stand, rolled down the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product and customer service
customer_reviews.text: Love my BeachBub! Not only a great product but exceptional customer service. While in the beach someone stole my accessories (karma will take care of them). I called the company hoping to purchase just the base, shovel and grabber. They replaced everything for Free!!!! It was even shipped via Fed Ex. I was SHOCKED! Bill, the customer service rep, was so nice and made my day. Yes its pricey but well worth every penny. Several of my neighbors on the beach have them and even after years of heavy use they all still look and work great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy but needs improvements
customer_reviews.text: The biggest problem is it's inability to tilt. Because it only sits straight up you have to move your chairs around to stay in the shade and sometimes end up yards away from it so you take up way more space on the beach and still don't have that much coverage. Other inconveniences include: sand bag is annoying to fill and umbrella is heavy. Positives are that it is heavy duty and so far (about 5 uses) has stood up to the wind.
customer_reviews.author: Rob n Kerry

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart completely the first time I used it
customer_reviews.text: I liked that it was easy to set up and the sand pyramid idea was very clever. Unfortunately, the umbrella portion is not strong and broke apart in the wind the very first time we used it. It was not even that windy. The setup is only as strong as its weakest link, which is the umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Best beach umbrella ever
customer_reviews.text: When we moved to Southwest Florida we wanted a beach umbrella that would last and not blow away in moderate wind. I saw the reviews for about the BeachBub so I bought one. We use it all the time and never worry about it blowing away or turning inside out. After one year of using it at least twice a week, it still looks good and works like it was new. ONLY criticism is that it is a little smaller than the larger umbrellas. It barely has enough shade for two people when the sun is directly overhead. I do wish it was larger in diameter.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie H

customer_reviews.title: Holds up to high winds!
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella is amazing. Our first use we were facing steady, strong winds. Only two other umbrellas on the entire beach, as far as the eye could see in any direction, were still standing. We were nervous! Would we impale someone on our first assembly attempt? Will we face humiliation as our umbrella lifts off and races down the beach? Nope! It stood strong. It received many a furtive glance as we bobbed up and down in the ocean waves but alas our umbrella could be seen standing proud above the ruins of inferior beach products!
customer_reviews.author: The Shermans

customer_reviews.title: MY SEARCH IS OVER...
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a quality umbrella that would keep me shaded and I wouldn’t have to continually mess w and have to rearrange because the wind was blowing. The stood the test. It’s quality is very good. Details thought out. AWESOME customer service. I wrote an email to them and the president personally called me back. I got the table and the flagpole. So easy to find our umbrella due to flag. I absolutely loved it.
customer_reviews.author: allygator

customer_reviews.title: Too good to be true
customer_reviews.text: Got this product about 2 months ago. Appears well made with lots of thoughtful details, like a padded strap on the carry case and hooks for your beach bag. Did lots of research on beach umbrellas and thought I finally had the Cadillac of umbrellas. Unfortunately on the 2nd use, the umbrella was completely destroyed. Struts snapped in half leaving it completely unusable. I really wish I could give it more stars, but I had to carry the broken umbrella from the beach in pieces.
customer_reviews.author: amazonshopper

customer_reviews.title: Easy set up!
customer_reviews.text: We go to Daytona Beach every year and as you probably know, it can get very windy. This umbrella is so awesome that I am buying one for my daughter. I would give it 5 stars but the only thing wrong with it is, the little thing that holds the umbrella up to keep from closing is plastic and rounded on the edge so it will keep closing. I have to use the towel hanging gadget to hold it up. It works fine but it should not be necessary. I should of reported this last year but forgot.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: The umbrella is nice....but a lot of set up...and still blows over in wind
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure how this is better than just having a really sharp base point that you can drive into the sand (like all of my beach neighbors had). It takes 15 minutes to set up, and still did no better in 25 mph winds than anyone else's (actually worse than some). And it is expensive. Good idea, but doesn't really seem to be superior to others. I'll keep it and use it, but I would have gone with something different if I had to do over. In fairness, it does seem to be pretty high quality from a materials standpoint - nothing broke, but it did blow over, even with the massive bag of sand holding it.
customer_reviews.author: TL6

customer_reviews.title: The Last Beach Umbrella you will ever own!
customer_reviews.text: I'm a professional engineer (Nuclear-Electrical-Systems), and I can tell you that these guys really figured it all out! From the purpose built tube to create the exact size channel in the sand while minimizing the disturbance to the surrounding sand, to the incredibly clever triangular do-job you shovel sand into, this thing is super stable, super easy to put up, and adding the tray and the towel hooks make it nearly perfect. Make a version that has some amorphsc solar cells on the umbrella, piped to a weather proof USB outlet, and you will change the beach umbrella world!
customer_reviews.author: David D Van Wagoner

customer_reviews.title: Best umbrella; absolutely worth it.
customer_reviews.text: This is an incredible beach umbrella. Very easy to set up, extremely sturdy, easy to take down, and easy transport. Our first day we watched other umbrellas bend inside out, get swept away by the wind, or be a pain to set up. This umbrella stayed so sturdy; doesn’t move at all with the breeze. We even lent the digging tool to another family to set up their umbrella. I bit pricey, but absolutely worth it. Could not recommend enough.
customer_reviews.author: MNB

customer_reviews.title: Great umbrella!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this umbrella for a recent trip to the beach. It was easy to set up and I had no trouble handling it on my own. It is slightly heavier than other, cheaper umbrellas but the bag made it easy to carry. The material on the umbrella is thick and nice. It was not terribly windy on the beach I visited but there was some wind. The beach bub was perfect. I especially appreciated how easy it is to take down. I am now a loyal customer! One suggestion I have is to include instructions for the extra pole and how to manipulate the umbrella with it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Watch a YouTube set up video!
customer_reviews.text: We were so excited to use our umbrella. The instructions seemed simple enough.. 4 of us struggling with people staring, and we realized it wasn’t as simple as we thought lol. We searched a YouTube set up when we got home & it all made sense! It’s easy once you know what to do. It is very sturdy, everyone else’s umbrellas were folding backwards on a hardly windy day and ours stayed strong. Also the towel hooks are so convenient for keeping sand off specific items! Worth the money 💰
customer_reviews.author: J.B

customer_reviews.title: High wind? No problem!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this umbrella close to a year ago now for a beach trip in October of 2019. While we did use the umbrella, the weather and wind were fine enough that it wasn’t really put to the test. Here we are on a May 2020 beach trip in Alabama and it is WIN-DY!! BUT this thing holds like a champ. So much sturdier than a Walmart/Target beach umbrella that we end up throwing away at least once a year! It’s worth the price tag if you are letting that hold you back. As a fair-toned person that MUST have a reliable umbrella to enjoy the beach, this is 💯!!
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah Wright

customer_reviews.title: An answer to my prayers!
customer_reviews.text: I can’t say enough good things about this umbrella. I was constantly wrestling with our Tommy Bahama model. If I wanted to relax at the beach and there was any kind of breeze it would tip over unlessI held on to it with one hand. No such problem with the Beachbub. Set up is fairly simple. I put it up and forget about it until we’re ready to go. It’s built like a tank, which I feel justifies the cost. Even the carrying case is extremely well built. Time will tell, but as of now I consider this one of my better purchases from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Geedee

customer_reviews.title: Best beach purchase.. sturdy and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Excellent umbrella - this thing didn’t move and my family kept talking about how great and sturdy it was at the beach. Saw others taking theirs down due to high winds and broken arms ... this thing is a beast! Didn’t move the entire day. Love the anchor and how deep the pole goes in the sand. As a “survivor” of a few swept away canopies on the beach of other beach goers I realize the safety of a good beach umbrella... this is a winner.
customer_reviews.author: J Doy

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Definitely withstood the beach winds this past week! I noticed that many people had to put their umbrellas down because the wind was blowing them away and inside out. This one never wavered!! The only thing I didn’t like was that the canopy doesn’t have sides that hang down like the umbrellas do that belong to the condos. The condo umbrellas have a larger canopy that hangs down and provides more shade. Overall a good buy!
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I am 51 and suffer with secondary liver cancer. I have no trouble carrying and setting up this umbrella. In fact it took less than 3 minutes to set up and less than 2 taking it down (being generous with time, didn’t time myself). Offers great sun protection also. My best friends two and a half month old grandson was under the umbrella for 4 hours and didn’t get a lick of sun. STRONGLY STRONGLY recommend. Very much worth the money. Last trip we saw one umbrella blow away on our section of beach ( there were only a few of us with umbrellas) mine didn’t move.
customer_reviews.author: Marybeth Fiorelli

customer_reviews.title: Last umbrella I will ever buy!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is the Cadillac of umbrellas. It's made like the professional quality ones you'd find at a resort - Sunbrella cloth, sturdy ribs and pole. The unique feature is the base which is a three-sided bag of sand that you fill up and it anchors the umbrella to the beach, rather than depending on the pole in the sand. Very nice piece of work, and well worth the money if you don't like chasing umbrellas down the beach and apologizing. Update - we had this up on the beach in a kicking 20 knot breeze where other (foolish) people's umbrellas were tumbling down the beach. This umbrella only vibrated slightly at the top of the pole. Very impressive.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Best Beach Umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Best Beach Umbrella...stop looking. My nephews lost the bottom piece of the pole somehow?? I just called the warranty line and the President/Owner of the company personally answered the line and helped me. They are going to replace the piece at no charge from a Dec 2015 order! I have been in customer service my whole life and this is some great service. I should have my piece in a couple days. Regarding the umbrella, it is so well made and durable. Glad to see such quality is still being made. This umbrella will last many years and love the carry bag to hold everything. Get it and forget it, worth the extra money! Watch your nephews with it.....:)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Finally an umbrella that will last!
customer_reviews.text: Earlier this summer we used a brand new Nautica umbrella that broke within the first hour on the beach. I am fed up with cheap disposable beach umbrellas so I reluctantly purchasing this one. We are winding up a week on the Jersey Shore and I have to say that this beach umbrella lives up to its claims. Easy to assemble, sturdy, and barely moves in a strong wind. It also comes with a large carrying case so it's easy to store once you take it down. I also thought it would be heavy to tote to the beach but the large wide strap makes carrying it a breeze as well. WELL DONE!
customer_reviews.author: CapeCodBeachGirl

customer_reviews.title: The Greatest Umbrella Ever Invented
customer_reviews.text: This is the best beach umbrella I have ever owned & I’ve had plenty. I’m buying another one. Heck maybe two more. The inventors are geniuses & deserve some kind of award because it is incredibly easy to put-up by yourself & it does not blow over. It’s crazy sturdy & well-designed. You’ll see in the pic we are the only people out on the beach because everyone else lost their umbrellas or tents to the high wind. Everything is included for hassle-free beach shade and even the carrying case is comfortable! Thank y’all for a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Keb

customer_reviews.title: Wish I Could Give It 10 Stars
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this system 10 stars, I would! Nothing better than being at the beach on a windy day and watching other umbrellas falling over or better yet, flying down the beach! If you follow the instructions and fill the base like you are suppose to, you will not have a problem at all with it staying up during a windy day. ANd if for any reason you did follow the instructions and it does fall down or fly away you will have the satisfaction of knowing that you were the last umbrella standing and maybe it really is time to get off the beach!
customer_reviews.author: George Francis

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely love this umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this umbrella! It's sturdy, the only one not moving around with the wind on the beach, light weight, and easy to put up. If I could give 4.5 stars, I would! The only thing that I think could be an added feature is that the bottom of the pole needs a screw in style rod to make it easier to get it down into the sand. Other than that, it's almost perfect!
customer_reviews.author: CHRISTIE CAMPBELL

customer_reviews.title: Great beach umbrella!
customer_reviews.text: Great beach umbrella! We live 3 miles from the beach and go often. After buying “cheaper” umbrellas for years we decided to invest in a good one. This is it! Comes with a great carrying bag with a padded strap. Easy to get in the sand and up within a few minutes. Great quality! I love the extra ring of hooks that goes around the pole that you can hang towels on or hang a speaker from it for music! We dont get strong winds here but it seems much sturdier in the sand than the umbrellas with holders that you twist in. Awesome product. Would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: sarah wilhoit

customer_reviews.title: You Get What You Pay For
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty, very sturdy construction! Very well designed. This beach umbrella setups easily and quickly. The difference between the beachBUB All-In-One and the normal quality beach umbrella is remarkable. The sandbag stand concept is dramatically superior to digging a hole in the sand in which to bury the umbrella pole. It is expensive but is also a quantum improvement in quality.
customer_reviews.author: oldAvn

customer_reviews.title: Best Umbrella Ever!
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella is AMAZING. Before the beach bub, I was the mom struggling on the beach to put up an umbrella if my husband wasn’t with me. However this umbrella changed all that! It is super easy to assemble, even Nana can do it! We liked it so much last year, we actually purchased a second one to have more shade. It also comes with nifty towel hooks that you can use to hold your goods out of the sand. I would definitely recommend this to anyone in the market for a high quality, easy to assemble umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: shannoneunc

customer_reviews.title: Just received mine (READ RETURN POLICY)
customer_reviews.text: I just received mine. The first thing I noticed this thing is heavy and for good reason. Is truly high quality, I honestly feel like Im carrying car parts not an umbrella. This is not a bad thing since this is well made and sturdy. Im exciting to test it at the beach next week and will update once I do use it. For now: expect a very heavy duty umbrella, no corners were cut in the manufacturing of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mark G

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Umbrella!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great umbrella!!! Very easy to set up! Stood up to some very heavy winds. The hooks to hold your bags were really useful. The maker of this umbrella thought of everything! Even has directions printed on a pocket on the outside of carry bag. Buy it!! It is worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: SmokeyMountainGirl

customer_reviews.title: Best Beach Umbrella Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I am thrilled with the umbrella. We live close to the beach and the wind destroys our umbrellas at least 1x year. Yes this one is pricey but with the warranty that comes with it I’m sure we will be satisfied if anything does happen to it. We noticed during a gusty day a couple near us were the only ones that had their umbrella still standing and not turned inside out so we went over and asked them what kind it was and bought it. Looks great and does what it says it does.
customer_reviews.author: Colorado Gal

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but Rock Solid
customer_reviews.text: Took a leap of faith on the price but after seeing so many umbrella fails I thought it was worth a go. After 2 years on Florida beaches it has been perfect and works as well as it did on day one. The design is flawless and I don't understand people who have problems with it but everyone has QC issues and...failure to read instruction issues... Enjoying siting out of the sun watching people chasing their umbrellas down the beach..
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Ralph PA

customer_reviews.title: Great in wind and all beach environments.
customer_reviews.text: Was on a 2 week vacation to the OBX. Great weather, but the forecast called for high winds during most of our trip. Ordered the Bub online, delivered in 2 days and wow. Instant and easy shade on the neach; 35 mph winds-no problem. This is our Bub third year and close to 100 days on the beach. No problems. Will be ordering 1 for my first grandkid this week.
customer_reviews.author: David Emanuel

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product, withstood 25mph wind gusts like the Rock of Gibraltar. Made Tommy Bahama umbrellas look anemic. People actually came up to see how this thing was still standing while all other umbrellas were inside out or taken down. I was good salesman. The company should send me some sort of commission. Easy set up all you need is sand along with the auger and shovel provided. Well worth the extra money. The umbrella does not adjust so you just move you chair to the shade. Perfect for two people.
customer_reviews.author: richard sartori

customer_reviews.title: Impressed with company and product!
customer_reviews.text: Well made and almost fantastic design. Ours stayed steady at the beach. However our umbrella frame broke. I think possibly it should be a little shorter. It stayed in the sand. The supplier rushed me out a replacement frame and cover no questions asked. I’m very impressed. I went from delighted to disappointed and back to delighted. I’m a professional buyer ( this was a personal purchase) and deal with a lot of suppliers and I am very impressed with a company that stands behind their product! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: L1nda

customer_reviews.title: Yes!!!  Mom and Wife Approved
customer_reviews.text: Took this to the beach Wrightsville Beach NC. It was great. Most Everyone’s umbrella was whipping around and they would have to hold on to it. Our Beachbub didnt budge. To help get in the ground (Sand Goffer was a huge help) scrape the first 6inches of loose sand away. Then do the sand goffer, place the blue tarp Down, put your umbrella in the ground thru the blue hole and cover back up as pack with your feet. Then proceed to fill dirt in your...basically umbrella stand. You will be glad you bought this product!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Holland

customer_reviews.title: The last beach umbrella you will ever buy.
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly well-built, sturdy, beautiful umbrella. Rock solid engineering, made to last parts. As I sit a Virginia Beach today, seeing countless umbrellas lift off, this Beach Bub is barely moving. Such an amazing product. More expensive than others? Yes. Worry about (or chase) that cheaper one if you choose, and throw it away at the end of the season because it’s broken and beyond repair. Hands down this is one of the better products I’ve bought in recent memory.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love my Bub!
customer_reviews.text: This is a very sturdy umbrella. I did not get to test it in the wind as I had beautiful beach days. My main goal was to not get burnt in the sun and the Bub worked well for that. I highly recommend getting the table attachments. They kept my phone, book and drinks sand free. I love the carrying case as well. Plenty of room to store everything. I am very happy with my purchase. I won’t have to buy another beach umbrella because this one is perfect for me!
customer_reviews.author: Cathy Pratt

customer_reviews.title: It’s a high quality beach umbrella!
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella is the real deal. I used to have a Tommy Bahama umbrella that lasted for years but I lost it and when I went to buy another one the reviews all sounded like they turned into super cheap Chinese crap. I bought this because it’s AMERICAN made and I’m willing to pay more for a quality product. This thing is sturdy and won’t move until you take it down. Little shirt/towel holder is nice addition.
customer_reviews.author: James A.

customer_reviews.title: Rock solid
customer_reviews.text: I used to use a standard umbrella and a sand-screw. This BeachBub is a nice upgrade. It takes a bit longer to deploy with the digging and filling the bag with sand but it can handle the wind and provides enough shade for 2 adults and our toddler to play with her sand toys. Also, since it's stabilized by sand weight, as the sun moves during the day, it's easy to adjust the angle of the umbrella to keep the shade where you need it.
customer_reviews.author: Macker117

customer_reviews.title: Best solution for windy beach days
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice beach umbrella package. The umbrella and all accessories fit nicely in the included carry bag for easy transport to the beach. Put up and take down is an easy chore. The sand weight system keeps the umbrella where you want it. The carry bag also helps keep loose sand at a minimum for transport and storage. Everything seems to be well made and looks very attractive on the beach too !
customer_reviews.author: GK

customer_reviews.title: BEST UMBRELLA PURCHASE VERY IMPRESSIVE
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best beach umbrella we have ever had! We have had it for 2 years and never had to worry about it blowing away or folding on us! VERY EASY to set up and take down. We will never buy another umbrella! The shovel comes with to shovel the sand in the pouch also has a metal extension you can put on the handle to make it longer and easier to use!!! GREAT PURCHASE!!! Completely WORTH THE Money!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Busby

customer_reviews.title: Don't think twice. Buy it.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is awesome. We have people come up to us all day at our beach. It's a man made beach so not a thick layer of sand and lots of rocks underneath. Umbrellas take flight often even with the screw attachment. We've never lost this to wind yet!!!! Everyone comments on it!
customer_reviews.author: JLF

customer_reviews.title: Nice, sturdy, quality, reliable
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product. Used for 10 days straight. No problems with anything. Enough just for 2 parents sitting in the beach chairs, you would need a second umbrella for the kids. Easy installation, easy removal. Tools worked well. Kids loved playing with shovels. Never had problems with the wind - I honestly felt sorry for those guys whose umbrellas flew away and for those who had to keep digging and even drilling holes to ensure the umbrella would stand a moderate breeze.
customer_reviews.author: AT

customer_reviews.title: Don’t recommend
customer_reviews.text: It has broken multiple times. Hubs has repaired it but it won’t hold. It is going in the trash today. The sand pouch takes up so much space, there isn’t enough room left for 2 chairs. We had used it maybe twice when it broke. It won’t withstand beach winds
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Best Beach Umbrella!
customer_reviews.text: Solid like everyone else has said here, we went through two wimpy umbrellas before that have since been relegated to the recycling bin. Get the combo package, the base and towel hook are neat things to have along with the handy shovel. We took a small tote with us to put the wrench/shovel and base in post-beach and that along with the umbrella and pole all fit nicely in the bag. As for cost look at it this way - you can buy one of these or two of the popular less expensive ones. But even two of those less expensive ones are nowhere near the value of this bad boy! Get it you won't be sorry!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Di Schino

customer_reviews.title: Unparalleled construction
customer_reviews.text: 1/2 a cooler and 6hrs of sun later I was off to find some lunch. I returned to blistering winds bombarding the beach. Umbrellas of all brands were scattered and wind ridden to the ground. I watched atop a grassy knoll as my beachbub umbrella system stood tall. Pride filled my heart. “Alas! I cried, One is finally worth its weight.” My wife looked at me with lust filled eyes and said “Have your way with me tonight!” I retired to the condo shortly thereafter, holding my beachbub umbrella system as if it were a flag; the American flag. No other umbrellas compare.
customer_reviews.author: kyle

customer_reviews.title: Incredible!
customer_reviews.text: I never review, but this system is unreal. I’ve tried everything imaginable at the beach for shade and have wasted hundreds of dollars. Some things work occasionally, but always fail in high wind or take forever to set up. This is a one stop set up and forget it system that’s up in a flash. I literally giggle watching other people struggle on windy days and want to tell them so bad that you don’t have to keep re-digging or hold your umbrella. It’s worth every cent I promise.
customer_reviews.author: JD Sharp

customer_reviews.title: So glad we bought a BeachBub!!
customer_reviews.text: This has got to be the best umbrella on the market! We just returned from a week at the beach and absolutely LOVE this umbrella. Windy days are not a problem for this wonderfully designed product...it is "as advertised"! Super easy to set up, usually in less than 2-3 minutes unless an "adult beverage" is involved, large amount of shade and sturdy in even heavy wind during a storm on the beach! The sand gopher is quite the little tool and the towel hooks were a nice add to our purchase. Thanks again for your product, it made our week great!
customer_reviews.author: Andy Weatherstone

customer_reviews.title: The perfect beach umbrella
customer_reviews.text: I hesitated to order this because there were some negative reviews, but I'm glad I ordered it anyway. As long as the base is filled and packed with sand, the umbrella is sturdy. It's wider than its less-expensive competitors, and it offers great shade. The bag has a nicely padded strap and is roomy enough that we could put our old, standard beach umbrella inside as well.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy yet easy to set up
customer_reviews.text: Because I got this umbrella late in the beach season I only got to use it once. I was very pleased with how sturdy it was. The instructions for setting up the special features were extensive but easy to follow. I am over 70 years old and was able to set up the whole thing myself in a minute or two. Although the umbrella was very sturdy it was not too heavy for me to open by myself. My previous umbrella had been destroyed by wind the week before. This one was more than worth the extra money. I recommend it highly.
customer_reviews.author: NBlover

customer_reviews.title: Good Umbrella might be a bit small for more then 2 people
customer_reviews.text: This is my second summer using this umbrella and it has withstood the ocean winds as advertised, my only issue is it is a bit small my measurement only gets about 7' one inch and not the advertised 7.5', the only reason for the 4 stars instead of 5, if you have two big beach chairs you will be squeezed underneath it to get the shade. Just wish they had an 8' model, would get one since the one we have has stood the test.
customer_reviews.author: Kip Powers

customer_reviews.title: worth the money!!
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny, so easy to transport, setup, use, take down - everything is well made. I've had mine since 2017 and about to order another one so we can have 2. Very well made, I always bring home, wash off with fresh water, let dry and then put up until next beach trip and I think it'll last a lifetime. We use 6x a year at least, Florida winds so it is tough and holds up well.
customer_reviews.author: SLawhon

customer_reviews.title: A++++ umbrella and outstanding customer service
customer_reviews.text: I bought my Beachbub in June 2017 and absolutely loved it. A freak gust of wind in July 2018 caused one of the arms to pop out of the middle, although the umbrella never fell over or came out of the base. Completely forgot the umbrella until Memorial Day weekend at the beach and I needed it! Called the company on a Wednesday to take advantage of their 3-yr warranty and my new umbrella arrived early Thursday morning! Outstanding! Super polite on the phone, no questions asked. This really is a great umbrella that is easy to set up and take down. I did a lot of research before purchasing an umbrella and am more than pleased with my decision.
customer_reviews.author: deenat

customer_reviews.title: A welcome relief for a stress free vacation...
customer_reviews.text: The king of all beach umbrellas... I’m so glad that I didn’t go with a cheaper umbrella after watching many other people stuff theirs in the garbage after a windy day on the beach. Ours barely moved as we sat in comfort in 30mph winds and chuckled watching people chase their umbrellas and canopies down the beach. It was the diamond in the rough that made for a great vacation!
customer_reviews.author: Freedom Preacher

customer_reviews.title: Love it! While everyone else's umbrellas are being blown ...
customer_reviews.text: Love it! While everyone else's umbrellas are being blown about this one stays perfectly in tact PRO's: - Heavy duty - Easy to set up/take down - solid, won't invert in wind or blow away - carries easy CON's - does not tilt (you can manually pull pole to tilt) - wish they made a 9 foot model Still, an awesome umbrella that withstands the windy beach and easy setup/takedown HIGHLY RECOMMEND
customer_reviews.author: MoJO

customer_reviews.title: Best Umbrella I've Ever Owned
customer_reviews.text: Living in Naples, FL and going to the beach frequently for nearly 20 years, I have seen one hundred or more umbrellas fly up out of the sand and blow down the beach (which is dangerous). My new BeachBub Umbrella solves that problem and is super easy to setup. Breakdown is even easier. Man I wish I invented this product the first time my umbrella flew down the beach back in 2001 !!!
customer_reviews.author: Erol Denizkurt

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!!!
customer_reviews.text: This umbrella really delivered!! I could, in fact, put it up and take it down all by myself. We had two upright beach chairs and largish cooler and were able to keep all in the shade. It did not take very long to get the fifty shovels of sand to anchor the base of umbrella. The Beach Bub umbrella did not even try to move in the ocean breeze. We did, however, watch several other peoples’ umbrellas escape from their owners (they weren’t Beach Bubs). Planning to use on another beach trip very soon!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephen D McMahan

customer_reviews.title: This is the best umbrella!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely LOVE this umbrella. I was hesitant at first, because of the price, but I'm so glad I made the purchase. It is easy to assemble (and kind of fun), very sturdy, and was the most durable on the packed Gulf Shores beach. We had pretty strong winds one day, even rental umbrellas were down, but ours didn't budge. Whoever had the idea of putting BeachBUB business cards in the carrying case is a genius! We had people compliment and ask about the umbrella, so we were able to hand them a card! Now I need to order the attachable table!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Weathered the Storm
customer_reviews.text: Finally a newly developed and patented beach umbrella that "walks the talk" for an excellent price. Good products ain't cheap and cheap products ain't t good. Unfortunately nowadays even pricy products ain't good either. That company's product is a rare exeception. Benefits claimed and real world performance are consistent. Due to the wind gust here at the Florida Gulf Coast I have "lost" 4 beach umbrellas cheap and expensive during the past 5 years best case at the 3rd time of use. The beachBub has survived already 3 times without any "rescue operation". Great design, engineering quality and hence true value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Ralf D.

customer_reviews.title: did not work for us
customer_reviews.text: The whole sandbag thing was not effective or efficient. Sent it back
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The search is over
customer_reviews.text: This is the real deal. All of the other beach umbrellas I’ve ever bought can’t withstand even light breezes. I don’t see the Beacbub ever inverting and breaking the spine with wind gusts. There’s a very popular beach access point down the road where they have a huge dumpster. At the end of one breezy holiday that dumpster was filled with broken umbrellas- every brand I’ve ever seen except no Beachbub. We’re done here.
customer_reviews.author: JR_azon

customer_reviews.title: Best Beach Umbrella EVER!
customer_reviews.text: Over the years we've struggled with various beach umbrellas with sketchy anchors and rickety frames that have been unstable and vulnerable to turning inside out on windy days. BUT - last summer we bought our first Beach Bub and we will never buy another brand!! In fact, we bought a second Beach Bub this summer for when company comes! We are just blown away by the simplicity, ease of use, and sturdy structure of the Beach Bub. Simple to set up, strong, and looks great! We may never need to buy another umbrella, but if we do, it will be a BEACH BUB!
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth J Hudson

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product! You will love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product! I never thought I would be excited about a beach umbrella but OMG! The construction is super high quality. I didn’t think that we would use the included base as we have a sand anchor but the design of the base is genius! The umbrella was great in windy conditions at Tybee Island. We never had a worry about it flying off or breaking in the wind. Set up and take down are quick and simple. If you are in the market for a sturdy long lasting beach umbrella this is it.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Hahn

customer_reviews.title: best beach umbrella ever
customer_reviews.text: these are worth every penny. our beach we grew up going to banned tailgate style tents and we were forced to use umbrellas a few year back. most wore out in a summer and never stayed secured comfortable. I found these a couple years ago and they are unbelievable. easy to set up and sturdy. they stay put in strong winds and are easy. we have three and two of them are gonig on 3rd summer or steady beach use. don't waste money on cheaper it's not worth it. I have people constantly come up to us on the beach asking where we got them. thanks beach bub for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Boozer

customer_reviews.title: SUPER STURDY UMBRELLA
customer_reviews.text: LOVE this umbrella. Extremely sturdy and wind resistant when installed according to directions( someone put it up for me at the beach without digging deep enough or adding enough sand and it came out) . Soooo, follow the directions and it will work great. Several windy days and my umbrella was one of the few that could withstand the wind. The company gives you everything that you could need to make storage, carrying and set-up a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon P

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic umbrella that stands up to wind. I have used this umbrella several times in the last month since I got it. It is easy to put in place , and extremely sturdy in wind. Great sun protection. By far, this is the best beach umbrella I have ever owned , and I have had MANY. When all the other umbrellas at the beach are taken down because wind too strong, mine stays in place with almost no movement.
customer_reviews.author: gus manocchia

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Umbrella!
customer_reviews.text: This is one awesome beach umbrella. Easy set up. No 2 foot hole to dig to put the post in. The sand bag does all the supporting you’ll need for a great day at the beach. We have never worried about this umbrella blowing away. This stays put and is very sturdy. This umbrella will give you years of use instead of having to buy a new cheap umbrella for every time you go to the beach! Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Donna S.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Product - Best Beach Umbrella
customer_reviews.text: I finally have a beach umbrella that is sturdy and secure in the sand thanks to the unique base. This umbrella will not fly away in the wind and is a high quality umbrella yet light enough for me to carry. I am a petite grandmother and I carry the Beachbub bag along with my chair and my filled to the brim beach bag by myself and put the umbrella system up by myself. Thanks for such a great product. I wish other people were using it so I could feel safer from flying umbrellas which is, unfortunately, a regular occurrence.
customer_reviews.author: Judith Moody

customer_reviews.title: BEST BEACH UMBRELLA EVER!!!
customer_reviews.text: We have had a several beach umbrellas and tents over the years, and have yet to find one that doesn't blow over at some point. Not only has this one withstood some pretty windy beach days, but my kids can do part of the setup themselves! All parts seem to be very high quality - great value for the money.
customer_reviews.author: EI

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy umbrella!
customer_reviews.text: We live in Seattle WA and live by a beach and it can get windy and we haven’t had any issues. The real test for us was taking it over to Chelan, WA where the winds can get pretty strong and I was able to leave it up all week with no movement! Highly recommend this umbrella!
customer_reviews.author: Alaina N.

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm.
customer_reviews.text: We used it for the first time yesterday, and the winds were a good 20 mph, with higher gusts. It took a good 5-7 minutes to set up, but once it was up, it worked like a charm. Other than the professional umbrellas that are available for rent, ours was the only umbrella open on the beach. Other people new best to not even try. I do suggest setting up closer to the water; the dampness of the sand adds additional weight as ballast.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Lemler

customer_reviews.title: A sure winner!
customer_reviews.text: Took this with us to OBX last month, put it to the test, and it passed with flying colors! We watched, over the course of a week, two broken umbrellas not able to withstand the onshore, offshore breezes, and one umbrella uprooted from the sand tumbling along with its sharp point ready to do some damage. Our BEACHBUB just sat there watching the hole thing with a smirk on its face, firmly planted. Easy to assemble and disassemble; the storage bag is perfectly designed for ease of carrying. Intelligent design, 3-yr warranty, quality construction and materials make it needing nothing. Oh! And there’s even a height-adjustable ring to hold your beach bag or towel or trash bag!
customer_reviews.author: Hiking enthusiast

customer_reviews.title: Great Beach Unbrella
customer_reviews.text: The beach bub umbrella was easy to set up. It was a moderately windy day and the umbrella was strong and didn't give in to the wind at all. The vents at the top help too. We saw a couple traditional, flimsy umbrellas get blown out of the same but the beach bub was great. It also provide a good amount of shade due to the size of the umbrella. The only issue was with the handle for the shovel which was too large and could not be attached together. This doesn't affect the umbrella at all, just strange. I would recommend the beach bub.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy. Peace of mind -  it won’t blow into somebody.
customer_reviews.text: We liked everything about it. It IS a little bit heavier than the cheaper one we’ve used for years - if you have to carry it a distance — but it’s certainly doable. We used it once last week. It’s great. When we were taking it down the guy next to us on the beach commented that it was a really nice umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: Beachgoer

customer_reviews.title: Works well! But be careful!
customer_reviews.text: I am going to say this is the best beach umbrella I have owned. And let me tell you I have been through a few of them. This umbrella really Stands up on a windy beach day. I gave it three stars for assemble because opening the umbrella took a lot of strength the first time I had to ask my daughter to help me and we did it together. Also when I went to put it down it was hard I actually pinched my finger causing a small cut. After that first day I used a beach towel around my hand to close the umbrella. It definitely feels durable.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia Dawson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put up....
customer_reviews.text: I've only used this once, at the beach in Atlantic Beach NC, but it worked great. Didn't have a lot of wind that day, though. It was much easier to put up than I thought. Very easy to get the tarp filled with sand. Much better than the new "Shibumi's". They are very noisy in the wind and droopy without wind!
customer_reviews.author: Cari

customer_reviews.title: The best umbrella.
customer_reviews.text: We used the BeachBub anchoring devices on our Tommy Bahama umbrellas last summer. The winds off the Atlantic Ocean in southeastern NC can be very severe. The BeachBub anchoring was the only thing that kept the Tommy umbrellas in place last year. Like many people, after worrying that your lesser umbrella is going to be torn to shreds or blown many yards down the shore, we decided to invest in a better umbrella. Super easy to set up.
customer_reviews.author: PY

customer_reviews.title: BEST Beach umbrella EVER !
customer_reviews.text: Easy for one person , woman as well, to put up . The pipe included to dig hole in the ground the right size as the pole was perfect , fast and efficient, Then set up of umbrella was easy and with the sand holding it down even on the very windy days it never looked like it was going to lift up or fall over etc. After 30 yrs of trying so very many kinds this one was perfection !
customer_reviews.author: Nurse And Mom

customer_reviews.title: Great umbrella!!
customer_reviews.text: We've only used this once but so far it was perfect! After witnessing umbrellas flying off, turning inside out, etc, I decided to search for the best I could find. I settled on this one and couldn't be happier. Our first time to use it was a great test because it was a very windy beach day! The set up was easy, and it didn't move all day. Our beach neighbor came over and asked what we had and where we got it since she noticed it was the only umnrella that hadn't moved all day. Best purchase all summer!
customer_reviews.author: Am F

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Beach Umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Just got back from beach and used this product everyday. It lives up to its billing. Several days were very windy and many other people at the beach had their umbrellas blow over or turn inside out. This one held its own! It is heavy duty and good quality! Though it is more expensive than some others, I think it is worth it as it will outlast other cheaper umbrellas and pay for the difference over time. The only drawback is that it is a little heavy to cart to and from the beach everyday but again, well worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa Brown

customer_reviews.title: But it is really great.!
customer_reviews.text: i was hesitant to purchase this umbrella. But it is really great.!! It is so easy to use, carry to beach, and is well made. As with anything you get what you pay for. I am using this umbrella often, and waiting for the windy day to come that I will be the only one with the umbrella still up. It can certainly withstand high winds. And what I like is that it won't sway with a wind gust, and no worries about your umbrella blowing away.
customer_reviews.author: sarah smith

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I’ve search for the perfect beach umbrella for many years. I finally found it. It is sturdy and holds up to the wind. The best part is that I can handle it all by myself. I was very hesitant to spend this much money on a beach umbrella! I believe it will be worthy of the price.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: We are constantly struggling to keep our umbrella from flapping in the wind, bending the spokes, and/or blowing down the beach. Now, we just need it a little larger. Love, love the sturdiness! We need your team to build a better beach cart or wagon that folds up and the wheels actually roll.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Ann Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great product / great company
customer_reviews.text: I bought this umbrella system last year when living in Michigan with the intent of using it when I moved to Florida. I now live in Florida and have used it 10 times at various beaches. It is wonderful. We have encountered fairly strong winds at the beach on occasion and the umbrella never waivers - it stays in place and does it's job. It is very sturdy and attractive to boot. I am not one to write reviews, but recently I contacted this company to see if I could buy an extra part for the umbrella system. They responded by sending me the part requested at no cost ( in a timely matter).
customer_reviews.author: Dan G.

customer_reviews.title: The best beach umbrella. No kidding.
customer_reviews.text: Have two of these. Easy to tote to beach. Big. Two of them next to each other is shelter for the whole family. This is nice as many beaches now ban “pop up” shelters. Very easy to set up. Be sure to wash off when you get home to avoid sand in upright pole connections. Prevents galling. They will stand up in a gale and barely flap when other umbrellas have flattened or blown away. Crazy.
customer_reviews.author: Hhagan

customer_reviews.title: The Bub performed exactly as described!
customer_reviews.text: It's sturdy, well-built and well-designed right down to the very sturdy carry bag. The instructions properly emphasize that the Build-A-Base MUST be *packed* with sand in order to hold the umbrella securely. If the Base shows stress from being packed with sand, it's properly filled. The area shaded by the umbrella is comfortably large, the towel-drying ring with hooks is a simple smart & helpful extra-
customer_reviews.author: Judith M.

customer_reviews.title: Breaks in the wind
customer_reviews.text: We loved this umbrella the first week we used it. It’s easy to secure to the ground, and lightweight and easy to carry. However, we just brought it to the beach for the second time, and after one day on the beach all of the arms of the umbrella broke and bent different directions with a little amount of wind. So, I would caution buyers to NOT use this if it is even a little bit windy at the beach. It probably won’t blow away, but it will break.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Havens

customer_reviews.title: Great beach umbrella!!!
customer_reviews.text: Finally found a good beach umbrella!!!! We’ve used this in Virginia Beach and Florida and it was GREAT! It’s easy to set up and can handle the beach breeze like a champ. I also purchased the attachable table directly from beach bub and love that as well! Definitely worth the money!!

customer_reviews.title: This umbrella works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Well made and easy to set up. Comes in a nice carrying bag. It also comes with a nice took that helps speed up the install. Only one thing I would change, is the length of the pole. The umbrella after installed is at a height of approximately 70 inches, average height people will always hit their forehead if not careful a pole 6 inches longer would be ideal. I thought price was high but they include a three year guarantee that covers even theft.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph A. Loffredo Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Sturdiest umbrella on the beach, but not worth $100 more than the others
customer_reviews.text: This is a good umbrella and it stays solid when the wind is blowing, but so do everyone else's for the most part. I love the sand pouch thing to keep it firm, but that's really the only difference, and doesn't seem worth $100 more than you'd pay for the others here on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: Great company, awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: Wow, awesome sturdy quality, love love love. Easy setup. The gopher tool included is really helpful! Also lightweight to carry, really thought it would be heavier on my shoulder, but it's just a perfect weight. Great communication from company as I kind of needed asap bc had a visitor coming to town and they got it out to me so thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: Laureen B.

customer_reviews.title: Best beach umbrella
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my girlfriend last Christmas. This doesn't move during periods of high wind when other people are chasing their umbrella down the beach. This size is great and blocks the sun. I can sit under it all day and fell like I get little sun. The only down side is it only blocks the sun, not other people's view when I'm under the umbrella. So I still have to wear a swimsuit on public beaches. Well at least according to that one beach cop...
customer_reviews.author: Chris W

product_meta.title: BEACHBUB All-in-One Beach Umbrella System. Includes 7 ½' (50+ UPF) Umbrella, Oversize Bag, Base & Accessory Kit
product_meta.description: After 10 years, from the day that the beachBUB was invented in Naples, Florida, the updated beachBUB (50+ UPF) 7 ½ foot All-In-One, Beach Umbrella System has arrived. Our updated model includes 2 US Utility Patents and 2 Patent Pending features that have revolutionized the retail beach umbrella. In addition to our newly designed and engineered 4 piece hub system, which will prevent canopy inversion up to 46 MPH is our US Patent Pending Canopy Tensioning System. This Tensioning system guarantees that your canopy will never lose its shape. This new updated umbrella system is being sought out by beachgoers in 22 countries and by resorts worldwide. Your system also includes our US Utility Patented beachBUB ULTRA Beach Umbrella Base and now comes with a lifetime warranty. Added to that is our beachBUB Sand Gopher, which makes a small hole for the pole so total setup is easy and convenient and in less than 2 minutes you’re relaxing in your chair and because the unique pyramid shape of the beachBUB base has a low profile you’ll have plenty of shaded space for you and your family. The beachBUB Umbrella has been designed, engineered and built to Resort and Commercial Beach Umbrella standards which allows it to withstand wind gusts up to 35 MPH. By using high strength, corrosion free aluminum, fiberglass and stainless steel frame materials our umbrella is built for years of dependable use. In addition, the canopy fabric is specifically made for our umbrella system and has the highest sun screening rating (50 UPF), 220G thread count and SP coating that insures superior abrasion properties. Finally, the entire system fits easily into our oversize umbrella bag and there’s even room for our new Tray Table System (Sold Separately). All beachBUB Umbrella systems sold after Sept 2018 are covered under our 3 year frame warranty and 3 year protection plan. See why so many umbrella rental companies and resorts are now using our system. Check out the "Related Video Shorts" below.
feature_bullets: In 2009 the beachBUB Base was invented in Naples, Florida. Thousands of hours of designing, engineering and testing have brought us to our 2020 All-In One Model. This umbrella system has evolved from input from hundreds of everyday beachgoers just like you and we thank them for their input. This umbrella system is assembled, inspected and shipped from our factory in Greensboro, North Carolina so if you ever have a question or issue we are only a phone call away

Approved for all beachgoers who struggle with their Beach Umbrella. Recently endorsed by the American Life Guard Association " The ALA has always been concerned about the serious hazards of Fly-Away Beach Umbrellas caused by unpredictable breezes along the coastlines, and we feel beachBUB offers a unique and easy solution that will prevent many injuries and even save lives in the long run". Check out July 2016 Consumer Reports Magazine "BEST OF" for "Beach Umbrellas That Won't Blow Away"

Wind tested to 35MPH. Sits on top of the beach like a Patio Umbrella stand that sits on a deck. No deep holes to dig or twist screw used. Lay the beachBUB tarp flat on the beach, make a small hole using the beachBUB Sand Gopher, insert the bottom pole and connect 2 wings to form a pouch, fill the base halfway with sand, attach the 3rd wing and finish filling the base compacting the sand as you go to insure that all 3 sides are firm and taut.

Easy to transport with it's extra large carry bag, padded strap and handle. Umbrella and base weighs less than 9 lbs (Gallon of milk or 12 pack of your favorite beverage) and base folds up to the size of a paperback book. Base weighs 120lbs when filled with sand. Total take down and packing is about 1 minute. Your purchase includes the 3 Year Protection Plan and 3 year frame warranty.

Now that we have solved all of the setup, stability and quality issues lets really start to enjoy the Luxury Beach Resort experience, on your terms. Checkout the new beachBUB Tray Table System available now on Amazon. This US Patent Pending Tray Table will keep everything organized and sand free. All beachBUB Umbrellas bought after sept 2018 are grandfathered in under our new warranty program. Lifetime warranty on beachBUB Base. Call beachBUB USA for details, 866-432-1976 or info@beachBUB.com

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.9 out of 5 stars1,255 ratings4.9 out of 5 stars
